name: How To Make Guacamole In A Molcajete
description: We're grinding an onion-jalapeno-cilantro paste in a molcajete for a delicious batch of homemade guacamole.  Don't forget a final squeeze of lime!

recipeInstructions.text: Start by chopping up 1/4 onion, 1/2 jalapeno, and 10 sprigs of cilantro.
recipeInstructions.name: Start by chopping up 1/4 onion, 1/2 jalapeno, and 10 sprigs of cilantro.

recipeInstructions.text: Add 2 tablespoons chopped onion, 1 teaspoon chopped jalapeno, and 1 tablespoon chopped cilantro to the molcajete along with 3/4 teaspoon salt and the juice of 1 lime.  Grind into a paste using the pestle.
recipeInstructions.name: Add 2 tablespoons chopped onion, 1 teaspoon chopped jalapeno, and 1 tablespoon chopped cilantro to the molcajete along with 3/4 teaspoon salt and the juice of 1 lime.  Grind into a paste using the pestle.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the flesh of three ripe avocados to the mixture and combine well.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the flesh of three ripe avocados to the mixture and combine well.

recipeInstructions.text: Take a taste for seasoning.  I added another pinch of salt and another squeeze of lime to this batch.
recipeInstructions.name: Take a taste for seasoning.  I added another pinch of salt and another squeeze of lime to this batch.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve immediately and store leftovers in an airtight container in the fridge.
recipeInstructions.name: Serve immediately and store leftovers in an airtight container in the fridge.
